channel.title: Membership subscription question
channel.description: I am about to make my friend a member for a month, now I've noticed that it automatically updates membership every month whenever there is money on the credit card and I'm afraid it might renew for him when we least suspect. If I click on that "Cancel subscription" option, will it only cancel the monthly renewal thing and let him use his left-over membership days, or it will remove his membership completely?

item.title: Membership subscription question
item.dc:creator: @Aff Aff
item.description:
@Aff wrote:

omfg their lying to yu it it actualey deletes all credit dont do it!! waste of money!!

Read full topic

item.title: Membership subscription question
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

Great. Thanks for the answers. 3 answers should confirm it.

Read full topic

item.title: Membership subscription question
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:2, topic:442189"][quote author=Mitko link=topic=544833.msg3993883#msg3993883 date=1337000426]
I am about to make my friend a member for a month, now I’ve noticed that it automatically updates membership every month whenever there is money on the credit card and I’m afraid it might renew for him when we least suspect. If I click on that “Cancel subscription” option, will it only cancel the monthly renewal thing and let him use his left-over membership days
[/quote]
Yes.[/quote]

Read full topic

It removes the renewal part
